731081f.title: Bridges - Williamsburg Bridge - [R. Hoe and Company.]
731081f.text:
The Williamsburg (East River) Bridge under construction as
viewed southeastward from the Manhattan shore. In the foreground
is the area thet will be cleared (1939) for the East Piver Drive.
The R. Hoe and Company foundry on the right will shortly be removed.
About 1903-4
Ewing Galloway

731097f-b.title: Bridges - Williamsburg Bridge - [View of the bridge from Stanton and Rivington Streets.]
731097f-b.text:
Williamsburg Bridge as photographed southeastward from
the Manhattan side of the East River. In the foreground
is the newly constructed East River Drive and marginal
park. These rest upon filled ground. The photographers
vantage point is at Stanton and at Rivington St's.
June 1, 1939
No's. 1-2
P. L. Sperr
